DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effect high-dose ICS vs. placebo adult chronic stable asthma .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Physician diagnosis asthma . Age ≥18 year ≤50 year Evidence airflow obstruction measure spirometry flowvolume loop per American Thoracic Society guideline . Treatment asthma : daily inhale corticosteroid longacting beta2agonists , AND asneeded use shortacting beta2agonist Exclusion criterion : History > 10 packyear tobacco use Other pulmonary cardiac diagnosis actively treat History adverse event allergy fluticasone Systemic corticosteroid therapy within 7 day study visit Inability obtain write informed consent
